spells.name: Battlemind Link
spells.description: You and an ally gain attack and AC bonuses.

spells.name: Cold Ice Strike
spells.description: Cone of ice slivers deals 1d6 cold/level.

spells.name: Contagion, Greater
spells.description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

spells.name: Curse, Major
spells.description: As bestow curse, but harder to remove.

spells.name: Envious Urge
spells.description: Targets steal from or disarm others.

spells.name: Leashed Shackles
spells.description: Target is restricted to a specific location.

spells.name: Monstrous Physique IV
spells.description: As monstrous physique III, with more abilities.

spells.name: Serenity
spells.description: Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

spells.name: Undead Anatomy III
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge undead.

spells.name: Utter Contempt
spells.description: Target's attitude worsens by two categories.

spells.name: Vengeful Outrage
spells.description: Target is compelled to destroy one enemy.
